original_text: Then the Lord told the great fish to spit Jonah out from its stomach. So it dropped Jonah onto the shore. Then the Lord told the great fish to spit Jonah out from its stomach. So it dropped Jonah onto the shore.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그 물고기에게 말씀하시매 요나를 육지에 토하니라

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord told the great fish
to spit Jonah out from its stomach
So it dropped Jonah onto the shore
Then the Lord told the great fish
to spit Jonah out from its stomach
So it dropped Jonah onto the shore
